statements: SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 50
SELECT material_name, energy_consumption FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE energy_consumption < 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint, energy_consumption FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint < 100 AND energy_consumption < 200 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC, carbon_footprint ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint < 50 OR energy_consumption > 200 ORDER BY energy_consumption, material_name
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint < 100 AND energy_consumption < 150 ORDER BY material_id
SELECT AVG(carbon_footprint) AS avg_cf, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_ec FROM BuildingMaterials
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint = (SELECT MAX(carbon_footprint) FROM BuildingMaterials) OR energy_consumption = (SELECT MAX(energy_consumption) FROM BuildingMaterials)
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, impact_category FROM building_materials ORDER BY impact_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM building_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint AS 'Carbon Footprint' FROM building_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 50;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM building_materials WHERE impact_category = 'Sustainable' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, impact_category, carbon_footprint FROM building_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 1000 ORDER BY impact_category ASC;

SELECT report_id, material_name, report_date FROM building_reports JOIN building_materials ON building_reports.material_id = building_materials.material_id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT material_name, impact_category, carbon_footprint, report_date FROM building_materials JOIN building_reports ON building_materials.material_id = building_reports.material_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Concrete';
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings WHERE construction_year > 1990;
SELECT * FROM environmental_reports WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT b.building_name, em.report_date FROM buildings b JOIN environmental_reports em ON b.building_id = em.building_id;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Wood' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000;
SELECT building_name, location, construction_year FROM buildings WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT building_name, report_date, impact_score FROM buildings b JOIN environmental_reports er ON b.building_id = er.building_id WHERE er.impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT material_name, impact_factor FROM building_materials bm JOIN environmental_reports er ON bm.material_id = er.material_id ORDER BY er.impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM building_materials WHERE carbon_footprint < 5;

SELECT building_name, material_name, quantity_used FROM buildings b JOIN building_material_usage u ON b.building_id = u.building_id JOIN building_materials m ON u.material_id = m.material_id ORDER BY quantity_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5;

SELECT building_name, location, material_name, quantity_used FROM buildings b JOIN building_material_usage u ON b.building_id = u.building_id JOIN building_materials m ON u.material_id = m.material_id;
SELECT building_name, SUM(quantity_used) AS total_quantity_used FROM buildings b JOIN building_material_usage u ON b.building_id = u.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT material_name, AVG(carbon_footprint) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM building_materials GROUP BY material_name HAVING AVG(carbon_footprint) > 0.3;
SELECT building_id, building_name, location FROM buildings WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, impact_category FROM building_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, location FROM projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, property_name, property_value FROM building_materials JOIN material_properties ON building_materials.material_id = material_properties.material_id;
SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity FROM projects JOIN project_materials ON projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, impact_category FROM building_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'wood%';
SELECT * FROM material_properties ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM projects WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, material_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM project_materials GROUP BY project_id, material_id;
